content:
I apologize for the mistake. I will provide four bullet points of interesting facts about each cleaning product, as per your initial instructions. Here are the facts:

* Machine rinse aid helps to prevent hard water spots and film buildup on dishes and glassware, improving their appearance and durability.
* Glasswash rinse aid can reduce the need for polishing and manual drying of glassware, saving time and effort.
* Machine glasswash is designed to effectively remove dirt, stains,
